heading: HB04231
0: AN ACT CREATING TWO (2) ADDITIONAL BRANCHES OF THE REGIONAL TRIAL COURT IN THE SEVENTH JUDICIAL REGION TO BE STATIONED AT THE MUNICIPALITY OF CANDIJAY, AND AT THE MUNICIPALITY OF VALENCIA, BOTH IN THE PROVINCE OF BOHOL, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE BATAS PAMBANSA BLG. 129, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS "THE JUDICIARY REORGANIZATION ACT OF 1980," AS AMENDED, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
status: Pending with the Committee on JUSTICE since 2019-09-04
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04231
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CREATING TWO (2) ADDITIONAL BRANCHES OF THE REGIONAL TRIAL COURT IN THE SEVENTH JUDICIAL REGION TO BE STATIONED AT THE MUNICIPALITY OF CANDIJAY, AND AT THE MUNICIPALITY OF VALENCIA, BOTH IN THE PROVINCE OF BOHOL, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE BATAS PAMBANSA BLG. 129, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS "THE JUDICIARY REORGANIZATION ACT OF 1980," AS AMENDED, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
